name: Achtung, der Klimawandel
description:
A splitscreen multiplayer 3D-remake of the classic ’Achtung, die Kurve’, set in a future Graz endangered by rising water levels. Each player tries to be the last snake rolling, by cutting off others and escaping the rising waterlevel. In this 3D-remake of the classicAchtung, die Kurve, hills provide a strategic elementas they influence speed and items can be picked up to increase survival chances.

System Requirements: MS Windows
